content: this is a top down crochet version of the melt the ice hat that starts with magic_ring and uses alternating double_crochet and front post double_crochet to create the ribbing for the band while i am making this pattern available for free i suggest a donation to any one of these mutual aid organizations every little bit helps https //www standwithminnesota com/ --- copied from https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat in the 1940 s norwegians made and wore red pointed hats with a tassel as a form of visual protest against nazi occupation of their country within two years the nazis made these protest hats illegal and punishable by law to wear make or distribute as purveyors of traditional craft we felt it appropriate to revisit this design
